data.name: AnyWay! - Challenge #5
data.detailed_description:
AnyWay! - Challenge #5
  • New challenge!
      Challenges mean new locations and levels to pass through. The levels are more difficult than the main storyline. They require proper training, skills and reaction!Challenge is available at any time from the main menu. (Does not affect story missions)

data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Polish, Ukrainian, Swedish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 530 or better
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
